exceptions.tactic: apply filterlim_comp with (f := f) (G := locally g) (H := locally l) in H1.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (T U V : Type) (f : T -> U) (g : U -> V) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (H : (V -> Prop) -> Prop), filterlim f F G -> filterlim g G H -> filterlim (fun x : T => g (f x)) F H" on hypothesis of type "filterlim h F1 (locally l)".

exceptions.tactic: apply filterlim_comp with (f := (fun x : T1 => f x)) (G := locally (h x)) (H := locally l) in H2.
apply filterlim_comp with (f := h) (G := locally l) (H := locally l) in H3.

original: intros. intros H1 H2 H3. apply filterlim_comp with (f := f) (G := locally g) (H := locally l) in H1. apply filterlim_comp with (f := (fun x : T1 => f x)) (G := locally (h x)) (H := locally l) in H2. apply filterlim_comp with (f := h) (G := locally l) (H := locally l) in H3. auto.
